## SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction class

A transaction that has already been sent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction<T = unknown> implements SentMoneypTransaction<BitcoinsTransactionResponse, MoneypReceipt<BitcoinsTransactionReceipt, T>> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BitcoinsTransactionResponse](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionresponse.md)<!-- -->, [MoneypReceipt](./lib-base.moneypreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BitcoinsTransactionReceipt](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Returned by [SendableBitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.sendablebitcoinsmoneyp.md) functions.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `SentBitcoinsMoneypTransaction` class.
